item.title: 美国例外贸易可能终结
item.description: 多年来，有一种交易一直是制胜法宝：做多美国，做空世界其他国家。得益于科技的活力和美国宏观政策的普遍支持增长，美国资产远远超过了全球同类资产。当然，一路上也有一些颠簸，但通常都是全球性的颠簸。2008-2009 年的金融危机是全球性的。科维德对整个世界都是一个冲击。但随着特朗普的关税政策，我们现在看到的是一个有可能成为美国特色的故事。【原文：For years and years now, there has been one winning trade: Go long the US versus the rest of the world. Thanks to tech dynamism and general pro-growth US macro policies, American assets have far outstripped their global peers. Of course, there have been some bumps along the way, but they’ve usually been global bumps. The financial crisis in 2008-2009 was global. Covid was a shock for the entire world. But with Trump’s tariffs, we are now looking at a story that has the potential to be US-specifi】
